function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Covid-19 crisis-response measures may discourage expansion and maintenance of housing stock, leading to barriers restricting mobility and impacting financial and economic resilience.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Customized policy responses to covid-19 are important based on the local situation and the needs of local people.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cities may suffer different consequences of the health crisis, impacting their recovery options and possibilities based on their trade openness, labor market structure, and industrial composition.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary suspension of evictions in multiple countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mortgage and rent payment suspensions in multiple countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support measures for construction industry and utility bill payment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of social distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic costs to businesses and people due to social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in living preferences leading to depopulation of large cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of green and sustainable construction in the housing industry","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of safe housing during the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary research on the impact of housing policies on covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public health and safety infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor urban design and architecture contributing to disease propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of crises on sustainable development","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased mental health issues due to restricted outdoor recreation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption to energy demand and supply due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for future waves of covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient readiness for waste and wastewater management in gbcss","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Undermined indoor environmental quality ieq in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New designs of living spaces may not effectively address contagious disease propagation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustainability rating methods may not adequately prioritize social and health aspects","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response to pandemic resilience requirements by existing green building certification systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for comfortable and high-quality housing due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap of residential and office real estate sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in sustainability requirements for residential buildings","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization and interconnectivity conventions could be challenged, leading to changes in politics and multi-scalar policies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The pandemic could be an opportunity and impetus to move away from unsustainable practices towards more sustainable ones.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The real estate industry was severely affected by the covid-19 pandemic in both the residential and commercial sectors.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction activities generating co2 emissions and waste production","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability in residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased demand for construction materials and resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regular physical exercise","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of vitamin d from sunlight","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excessive food consumption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of good air circulation indoors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Issues with indoor air quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excessive noise from upper floors in blocks of flats or from shared walls and gardens/communal spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy issues to maintain social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compromised indoor environmental quality ieq leading to increased vulnerability to diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of pragmatic guidance for mitigating health risks in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the relationship between buildings and occupant health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to affordable and adequate housing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of households to pay bills due to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Amplified housing insecurity due to the crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of highly contagious virus with high mortality rates.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shifts in behavior towards pro-environmental approach are driven by threat and coping appraisal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic can push individuals towards environmental responsibility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic speeding up progress towards social fairness and environment protection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adverse effects of counter-pandemic measures on sustainable development goals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
